1. "The social media thriller 'The Feed' tries to be a thought-provoking commentary on our addiction to technology, but its shallow script and poor direction make it a disappointing watch."
2. "The sci-fi epic 'Echoes' boasts an impressive budget, but its convoluted plot and lackluster characters make it a chore to sit through."
3. "The romantic comedy 'Love in the Time of Quarantine' attempts to be a witty and charming exploration of love during a pandemic, but its forced humor and poor pacing make it a forgettable film."
